last_episode_to_air.name: A Final Seine Off
last_episode_to_air.overview: Emily's family arrives in Paris to help her with the Sonya Rykiel drapes installation; Victoria's crush, Emelle, finally comes over for a visit; Margaux has her father over for the big reveal of her slip dresses.

name: Real Girlfriends in Paris
overview: Six twentysomethings embark on an exciting adventure living in the most beautiful city in the world: Paris. While experiencing the spontaneity of a new city. They find the possibilities of true love and forge friendships for life.

episodes.name: Bonjour Paris!
episodes.overview: Six bold twentysomething American women are living it up in the City of Lights. Victoria, Kacey and Adja share life stories over fried food and ranch dressing. Anya hosts the girls for an American Thanksgiving dinner where Emily opens up about wanting to find love in Paris.

episodes.name: Handball and Heartbreaks
episodes.overview: Adja confides in her aunt about her commitment issues. Victoria makes plans for her crush to come visit. The girls attend a professional handball game to watch Kacey’s new fling play.

episodes.name: Fromage a Trois
episodes.overview: Victoria’s issues with friend and work colleague Yoanne continue to accumulate. Faced with an expiring visa, Kacey turns to Anya for advice. Emily works the first day of her internship at a high-profile fashion event. Adja throws an American-style brunch.

episodes.name: A Frites Accident
episodes.overview: Kacey’s issues with her visa continue. The girls try to find love, or at least a hookup, at a lively speed dating night. Victoria’s frustration with Yoanne escalates and their friendship is tested.

episodes.name: On Thin Ice
episodes.overview: Victoria risks losing her job unless she can make things right with Yoanne. Emily steps up at work for an important photo shoot. Anya schmoozes potential clients. Margaux and Victoria double date at the ice rink. As the deadline to her visa gets closer, Kacey is faced with the possibility of having to leave Paris.

episodes.name: Yes We Cannes!
episodes.overview: Kacey bids farewell to the group before heading back to the U.S. The rest of the girls take to the south of France for a trip to Margaux’s family chateau, where they surprise Anya with a bachelorette party.

episodes.name: Un-Cannes-y Ending
episodes.overview: After a disappointing shopping excursion in Cannes, Anya opens up to the women about her financial situation. Margaux takes the first steps toward making her slip-dress venture a reality. Victoria finally sits down with Yoanne.

episodes.name: Hanging by a Thread
episodes.overview: With the Chloe Colette launch event days away, Victoria works round the clock to finish her collection; Emily makes a surprising pitch to her boss; Anya recruits Adja to help her prepare for the Maison Firestone event.

episodes.name: Hello, Dali!
episodes.overview: After getting her designs down the runway, Victoria shares some big news with her mum. Margaux sees her slip dress idea coming to fruition.

episodes.name: A Final Seine Off
episodes.overview: Emily's family arrives in Paris to help her with the Sonya Rykiel drapes installation; Victoria's crush, Emelle, finally comes over for a visit; Margaux has her father over for the big reveal of her slip dresses.
